Simulate multivariate functional data

Source: R/00_mfd.R
data_sim_mfd.Rd

Simulate random coefficients and create a multivariate functional data object of class `mfd`.

data_sim_mfd(nobs = 5, nbasis = 5, nvar = 2, seed)

Arguments

nobs

Number of functional observations to be simulated.

nbasis

Number of basis functions.

nvar

Number of functional covariates.

seed

Deprecated: use set.seed() before calling the function for reproducibility.

Value

A simulated object of class `mfd`.

Examples

library(funcharts)
data_sim_mfd()
#> $coefs
#> , , var1
#> 
#>             rep1       rep2        rep3        rep4        rep5
#> [1,]  0.79431830 -1.3437109 -0.46935538  0.29864727 -1.33884764
#> [2,]  0.47568895  0.6085331  0.22917728  0.05692691  0.68205314
#> [3,]  0.14094932 -0.2153929 -1.41953074 -0.08977528 -1.24526150
#> [4,] -1.16871574 -0.4072725  0.92298841 -0.99428879 -0.03922523
#> [5,] -0.07127292 -1.2620352  0.08525189  0.21597287  2.02678453
#> 
#> , , var2
#> 
#>            rep1         rep2       rep3       rep4       rep5

#> [3,] -0.1711916  1.283880511 -0.2369065  1.6537468 -1.5634852
